verbose_text: Tamoxifen was administered to 12-week-old littermates twice, 2 days apart, to induce expression of the constitutively active form of the HH receptor SMO (caSmo), commonly known as SmoM2, in the sub-set of NP cells that express CK19 (shown in XREF_FIG A).
evidence: Tamoxifen was administered to 12-week-old littermates twice, 2 days apart, to induce expression of the constitutively active form of the HH receptor SMO
